attributes.action: Ask the Department of Health to investigate the costs of glasses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are many millions of people who need to wear glasses and do so because of need not vanity. There should be a full investigation into the costs of lenses and the coatings that can be applied.
So that clear comparisons of price can be made before a purchase is made.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
